roleset.name: think about again, evaluate again
roleset.note: REASSESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reassess' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from reassess.01-v predicate notes)
REASSESSMENT-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to reassess.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from reassessment.01-n)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: The Soviet Union has halted construction of two Chernobyl-type nuclear reactors and is reassessing the future of 12 other existing reactors.
example.arg: the future of 12 other existing reactors
